mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENTS (DEPTNO, DEPTNAME, PARENT_DEPTNO, USE_YN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_EMP) VALUES( CASE WHEN #{deptType} = 'HQ' THEN 'HQ' || LPAD(DEPTHQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 2, '0') WHEN #{deptType} = 'D' THEN 'D' || LPAD(DEPT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 2, '0') END, #{deptname}, #{parent_deptno}, 'Y', TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD')), #{create_emp})
mapper.select: SELECT DEPTNO, DEPTNAME FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE PARENT_DEPTNO IS NULL ORDER BY DEPTNAME
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEES SET DEPTNO = NULL WHERE DEPTNO IN ( SELECT DEPTNO FROM DEPARTMENTS d WHERE USE_YN = 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT d1.DEPTNO AS "id", d1.DEPTNAME AS "text", NVL(d2.DEPTNO,'#') AS "parent" FROM DEPARTMENTS d1 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS d2 ON d1.PARENT_DEPTNO = d2.DEPTNO START WITH d1.PARENT_DEPTNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR d1.DEPTNO = d1.PARENT_DEPTNO AND d1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER SIBLINGS BY d1.DEPTNO

SELECT d1.DEPTNO, d1.DEPTNAME, d2.DEPTNAME AS PARENT_DEPTNAME, d1.PARENT_DEPTNO, TO_CHAR(d1.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(d1.UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DATE, e.NAME AS UPDATE_EMP FROM DEPARTMENTS d1 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS d2 ON d1.PARENT_DEPTNO = d2.DEPTNO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON d1.UPDATE_EMP = e.EMPNO WHERE d1.DEPTNO = #{deptno}
SELECT d1.DEPTNO, d1.DEPTNAME, d2.DEPTNAME AS PARENT_DEPTNAME FROM DEPARTMENTS d1 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS d2 ON d1.PARENT_DEPTNO = d2.DEPTNO WHERE d1.DEPTNO = 'D01'
SELECT DEPTNO, DEPTNAME, PARENT_DEPTNO, USE_YN, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_EMP, UPDATE_EMP FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE USE_YN = 'N'
